productAdvantages.title: Product Advantages
productAdvantages.description: PT. KONTAKPERKASA FUTURES is a futures brokerage company engaged in commodity trading and is consistent in its mission to develop the investment climate in Indonesia. The company also provides the best service for every customer, including market information services and education about Commodity Futures Trading, its opportunities and risks, as well as online transaction facilities.

advantages.title: Capital Efficiency
advantages.description: In trading activities using margin funds, investors can conduct relatively large transactions with relatively small funds. In this case, you do not need funds up to 100% as in stocks.

advantages.title: Transaction Flexibility
advantages.description: Transactions that utilize two-way trends allow investors to profit whether the price trend moves up or down.

advantages.title: Highly Fluctuating Price Movements
advantages.description: Significant daily price movements ranging from 20 to 500 points provide substantial profit opportunities with a contract size of US $5 per point, and customers are only charged a very small transaction fee, equivalent to just 6 points.

advantages.title: High Liquidity
advantages.description: These financial products have a high level of liquidity, allowing customers to conduct buying and selling transactions anywhere and anytime as long as the market is running smoothly, supported by a number of services and facilities with an online system.

advantages.title: No Time Limit for Open Positions
advantages.description: All customers are free to determine how long they want to conduct transactions without any penalties or administrative fees at the time of account closure or fund withdrawal.

investmentTypes.title: PT. Kontakperkasa Futures Investment Types
investmentTypes.description: In the investment business activities at PT. KONTAKPERKASA FUTURES, there are 2 types of investments, and these investment types are as follows:

fixedRate.title: a. Fixed Rate
points: US $1 = Rp. 10,000, this is a fixed rate.
With this fixed rate, you will be protected from the risk of loss due to USD or Rupiah fluctuations.

floatingRate.title: b. Floating Rate
points: US $1 = US $1, this follows the USD exchange rate against the Rupiah.
With this floating rate, there are no fees for opening and withdrawing USD funds, either in whole or in part.
